column3:
「辛抱強く なだめてあげれば馬には必ず気持ちが通じる」

貴方に教えて貰ったおかげで本当にこの子と仲良くなれました
column4: \"Be sure to take the time to soothe your mount...That's the only way it will know how you truly feel.\"Your advice was quite helpful—thank you.This little one and I are getting along quite well now.

column3:
……この王家の装備も最初 この子には あまり似合わないかな
と思っていたんですが今ではすっかり馴染んで見えるんです
column4:
At first, I wasn't sure if I should outfit him with all of
the royal gear.I thought maybe he should have to earn it first.But it works! He wears it like a true natural.

column3: 相手を想う気持ちって大事なんですね……
column4: I'm trying to be a bit more empathetic.Benefit of the doubt, you know?

column3:
あの向こうには知恵の神ネールより名を頂いた
ラネールという山が そびえています
column4: See that mountain?That's Mt. Lanayru.It takes its name from the Goddess of Wisdom.

column3:
力の泉でも勇気の泉でも私の力は目覚めなかった……

でも あの地なら……
知恵の神縁の あの泉でなら もしかしたら……
column4:
I've prayed at the Spring of Courage
and at the Spring of Power,yet neither awoke anything inside me.But maybe up there...Perhaps the Spring of Wisdom, the final of the three,
will be the one.

column3:
根拠は何も有りません……

けれど僅かでも可能性が有るのなら
私はそれに縋りたいのです……
column4:
To be honest, I have no real reason to think
that will be the case.But there's always the chance that the
next moment will change everything.

column3: 明日私は17歳になります
……あの山に行ってみようと思います
column4: So then I shall go...and make my way up the mountain.

column3:
「齢17に満たぬ者知恵無き者として入山を禁ずる」

……ラネールは そんな仕来たりを持った山なんです
column4:
Lanayru's decree is very specific.It says: \"No one is allowed, under the age
of seventeen...For only the wise are permitted a place
upon the mountain.\"
